Data Visualization: Scatter Plot

DOPING IN PROFESSIONAL CYCLING

Doping is a prevalent issue in the sport of professional cycling. The scatterplot below shares some information about doping among multiple notable cyclists. See the video by Mayo Clinic for more information on blood doping, and check out the Wikipedia page about doping cases in cycling to see the extent of the issue.
